short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hash your password with domain name (or any other text)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hash your password with domain name (or any other text)
Hash used is SHA-256 (base64)

This code uses CryptoJS v3.1.2
